h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai
content: For most of this fight, your key strategy should involve picking your moments to attack wisely, waiting for his bigger slams that take him a while to get back up and unleash your combo attacks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Wind_Cave_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Wind Cave Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Black Bear Guai'.
The content is as follows:
For most of this fight, your key strategy should involve picking your moments to attack wisely, waiting for his bigger slams that take him a while to get back up and unleash your combo attacks.
